message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $12000. Considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing further details with you.
